name: Paras
overview: Paras is a war simulation of small unit actions, in which a force of 15 men are under your direct control. You must decide what action each of these men will take each turn - there is a choice of up to 10 different actions. At the start of the game your force has already been dropped by parachute. The game comprises of two separate scenarios. In the first you must eliminate all enemy forces in order to secure a safe route for your retreat. The objective for the second part is simply to destroy the bridge.
